description: Go to https://globalapptesting.com and see what you can find!

steps.expected_result: Slack button should be visible next to Speak to us button
Prompt to install GAT slack application is displayed
You should see our welcome message on the slack

steps.instruction: Go to the GlobalAppTesting page and click Speak to us button
steps.expected_result: You should be redirected to the registration form

steps.instruction: Click on the First Name field
steps.expected_result: View scrolls to Company Email Address field and keyboard opens below it

steps.instruction: Click on the Company Email Address field
steps.expected_result: View scrolls to Job Title field and keyboard opens below it

steps.instruction: Click on the Job Title field
steps.expected_result: View scrolls to Speak To Our Team button and keyboard opens below it
